description:
In the far far future, technology has advanced enough so that it no longer matters what a spaceship looks like. You can have a space express service with a ship that looks like a 19th century train. Imagine where you can go and what adventures you can have. We follow Tetsuro as he goes on these adventures.
Source: AnimeNfo

REGULAR.description:
On the road to Megalopolis, Tetsuro is encountered by Count Mecha and watches as his mother is killed. Ironically, he is rescued by a woman who looks remarkably like his mother, and they set off on a journey on the Galaxy Express 999. He begins his trek towards the planet where he`ll be able to receive a mechanical body.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 出発(たびだち)のバラード

REGULAR.description:
The capital of Mars, Great Syrtis. It is a deserted planet with nothing but the blowing of the red winds. Tetsuro is attacked by Geronimo, who has long dreamt of boarding the 999, and has his pass stolen by him. Ultimately, he draws his gun on his lover, Fleme.
Source: crunchyroll

Tetsuro is rescued from a ghost by Claire, a waitress they met. But in doing so, Claire is blasted into a million pieces. After finally arriving on Titan, one of Saturn`s satellites, they go outside and Maetel is abducted. When Tetsuro goes to rescue her, oddly, he is given a gun by an old woman...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: タイタンの眠れる戦士

REGULAR.description:
The great bandit Antares hijacks the 999 and takes Tetsuro and the gang hostage as he forces them to make an unplanned stop at his home. He takes a liking to the humans Maetel and Tetsuro and invites them into his home. But lurking in there is...
Source: crunchyroll

Pluto, the resting place for the bodies of those who have replaced their human bodies with mechanical ones. Tetsuro is greeted by the ice graveyard`s caretaker, Shadow. She transforms herself to look like Tetsuro`s mother and lures him in. She attempts to kill him, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shadow of the Planet of Indecision

REGULAR.description:
Tetsuro arrives at the nest of Comets, Comet Station, and is shocked at its lack of vertical scope. He`s falsely accused by a suspicious man while killing time in a bookstore and gets attacked. He goes to a doctor, but instead of receiving medical care, he tries to force Tetsuro into buying a mechanical body!
Source: crunchyroll

The 999 spirals downward to the bottom of gravity. They enter into the 333, which had previously crashed in there, only to find that hundreds of years appear to have passed by! The woman who controls the passage of time, a witch named Ryuz, takes a liking to Tetsuro and drags him to her home.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Juuryoku no Soko no Hakaba Zenpen
The Graveyard at the Bottom of Gravity: Part One
重力の底の墓場 前編

REGULAR.description:
Continuing the plot, we find out that Ryuz is a depressed woman who was betrayed by the man she loved while she was transforming her body for him. Tetsuro sympathizes with her, but tells her, "I want to decide my future for myself." Ryuz`s retort to those words is...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Juuryoku no Soko no Hakaba Kouhen
The Graveyard at the Bottom of Gravity: Part Two
重力の底の墓場 後編

REGULAR.description:
Trader Junction, a crossroads for the Galaxy Railways. Surrounding the station are countless desolate travelers with nothing more to do but wait. Tetsuro offers to treat one of the travelers to food and drinks and gets mobbed by them all. He`s rescued by a women named Hanako, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: トレーダー分岐点 前編

REGULAR.description:
Tetsuro foolishly falls asleep and is taken by Hanako aboard the train bound for Wildflower Station. He is introduced to Hanako`s elderly parents as her fiance. After seeing the delight on their faces, Tetsuro didn`t have the heart to say anything. Even the idea of throwing a wedding reception is brought up...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: トレーダー分岐点 後編

REGULAR.description:
On the planet without a form, Nuruba, Tetsuro and Maetel are ambushed by its citizens for their bodies and their clothes are stolen. They plan to dress up like Tetsuro and Maetel and board the 999. A livid Tetsuro lunges at them, but...
Source: crunchyroll

The 999 has to make an emergency stop at Fossilized Planet, a place petrified all the way to the tracks. Tetsuro is curious about the fossils and leaves the 999. Suspecting that Tetsuro has intent to steal he fossils, a warrior who guards the Fossilized Planet attacks him...
Source: crunchyroll

Tetsuro rescues the fossilized warrior from a gang of thieves. However, the warrior runs off with Tetsuro`s pass. He attempts to leave on the 999 along with the fossil of his lover, Lidya. Just as Tetsuro follows him, the petrifying gas appears once again!
Source: crunchyroll

"Perfect Mechanization," a planet where all its inhabitants have taken on mechanical bodies. All its people look down upon flesh-and-blood humans. A female doctor named Laala purposely hits Tetsuro with her car. She attempted to switch bodies with him!
Source: crunchyroll

On the "Black Knight`s Planet," Tetsuro is invited to live together with the Black Knight. When Tetsuro refuses, he frantically throws his lance at him! Maetel jumps to the rescue but his his by the lance! Tetsuro stands up to the Black Knight to get revenge, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 水の国のベートーベン

REGULAR.description:
On the planet where people have the ability to glow, Tetsuro meets a struggling aspiring animation director named Fraiya. Tetsuro feels lousy after she rejects his offer to give her money. However, she invites him into her room and asks him to buy one of her animation storyboards.
Source: crunchyroll

On a planet where all living things are covered in hard armor, Maetel is hit by an armored bug and is seriously injured. Tetsuro leaves the train in search of a doctor, but there are only two people on the entire planet. Due to a misunderstanding, Tetsuro is attacked by one of them, Nutal!
Source: crunchyroll

In the "Mud Capitol," a city where the rain never stops, Tetsuro receives a phone call from a woman and is dragged out into the mud. There he encounters a poor woman named Maetel who lives within the mud. She invites Tetsuro to live together with him. He refuses, however, but when he tries to escape from her mud house...
Source: crunchyroll

In "The Kingdom of Atonement," a town famous for its sanitation, the conductor is attacked by a mugger on his day off! Tetsuro and Maetel console him. However, the news of the event reaches the upset Cleanliness Committee. They attempt to erase any record of the event and begin pursuing Tetsuro and the gang.
Source: crunchyroll

On Professional, the planet of memories, Tetsuro ignores Maetel`s advice, and makes eye contact with a professional hangman. They attempt to hang Tetsuro! He is saved by a professional gunman, only to be forced into a shooting duel!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: プロフェッショナル魂

REGULAR.description:
The inside of Ballera has become hollow. Tetsuro and Maetel are swimming around in the air when they`re attacked by some cowboys and it causes a big commotion. In the Tomb of Dead leaves, they encounter Mr. Moriki, a man made from a briar bush. But then, an electric mushroom causes the 999 to suddenly stop moving!
Source: crunchyroll

The 999 is raided by the pirate ship Queen Emeraldas. They try to put up a fight, but realize quickly that it is all in vain, and are forced to stop on the Pirate Planet. There, the female pirate, Emeraldas, proposes a duel. Maetel loses and they set off to dispose of her body! However, the Emeraldas they faced was really a fake!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 海賊船クィーン・エメラルダス

REGULAR.description:
This world has been split up, due to a feud, into civilization and primeval society. On this primitive planet, the gang is attacked by the locals and Maetel is nominated Queen. Queen Maetel orders for Tetsuro to be thrown off a cliff, but it`s all part of Maetel`s plan...
Source: crunchyroll

The Planet of Dimension Voyage travels across the galaxy at the whim of its egotistical queen, Egoterina. The gang is attacked by Egoterina`s men, but she takes a liking to them and invites them over for dinner. However, the queen is unimpressed, to say the least, with Tetsuro`s manner of eating...
Source: crunchyroll

Masspron, a world covered in factories. The hotel Tetsuro is staying in is burnt to the ground. Ironically, it was deliberately caused by a young girl named Chromeria, who is leading a rebellion to get people to learn to build things while also beautifying the planet. Tetsuro manages to save her from execution, but...
Source: crunchyroll

Horohoro egg vendor who loses a piece of his body each time he is betrayed by his lover. He`s to the point where his chest is completely hollow with the exception of a few bones. After selling eggs to Tetsuro, he pins a crime on him as he attempts to shoot his former lover and hew new man.
Source: crunchyroll

On this planet where snow never ceases to fall, Maetel and a straggling Tetsuro encounter a starving girl named Yuki. She offers to take them into her house after they offer her a piece of a biscuit. There, however, the girl`s mother attempts to cut Tetsuro open. She`s thinking about using him for food...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Goddess of Children and Easy Birth in the Snow Capital

REGULAR.description:
Tetsuro and the gang touch down on the supposedly uninhabited Mirage Planet. There, they encounter the great novelist, Shosetsu Yoi. Though he had given upall attachments to the world, he becomes attracted to Maetel. He decides to abandon Tetsuro on the planet and leave on the 999.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Great Writer of the Mirage Planet

REGULAR.description:
On the Jungle Planet, the gang is captured by the alcoholic ruler, Sakezan. Maetel is chained up and forced to drink. Along with Liza, the queen, Tetsuro escapes Sakezan`s lair and leaves Maetel behind. However, he returns again and faces Sakezan!
Source: crunchyroll

The 999 stops on Filament, a planet filled with gas, due to interference from some ghosts. There, Tetsuro is kidnapped by a ghost parent-child duo. They are planning on using Tetsuro`s body to revive the ghost! But once they realize that he`s on a mission to get a mechanical body, they...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 幽霊世界のフィラメント

REGULAR.description:
On the Fury Planet, a land where everyone is quick to pick a fight, Tetsuro slams into a tofu vendor as an assassin who works for Duke Mech, a friend of Count Mecha, targets him. Tetsuro feels bad for the kind-mannered tofu vendor and offers to give him some gold coins. But when he goes to leave...
Source: crunchyroll

The gang encounters the space warrior Edmond inside of the 999. His hometown, "Sweet, Sweet Planet" is shaped like an apple that has hadbites taken out of it. Because the ground tastes very sweet and delicious, the government has sold the land and it`s taken on a very ugly appearance. Upset by this, Edmond tried to battle the government, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Toma Toki Kuukan no Kajirare Hoshi
停時空間のかじられ星

REGULAR.description:
Ulatres, a planet that specializes in screws. There, a woman named Lasen takes a liking to Tetsuro and imprisons him in the hopes of them living together. Tetsuro escapes and Lasen gives chase. However, when she sees that Tetsuro will never give up, she takes a deep look at herself...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ウラトレスのネジの山

REGULAR.description:
Plated City, a planet where people are considered poor if they aren`t plated in gold. There, Maetel has her suitcase stolen by Wheel Lock, a young boy who wants to get plated. However, his mother tells him not to, so he gives up. Wheel Lock then begins to tell them about his planet...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Witch of Plated City: Part One
プレーテッド・シティの魔女 前編

REGULAR.description:
Wheel Lock`s mother is against the tradition of plating and is trying to form a resistance. As her dying wish, she asks Wheel Lock to continue the fight against gold plating. Tetsuro goes into the heart of it all, a magnetized, plated tower. But waiting inside is...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Witch of Plated City: Part Two
プレーテッド・シティの魔女 後編

REGULAR.description:
In a ghost colony where no one is supposed to live, Tetsuro and the gang meet Dr. Cicropros and a legion of his clones. Having failed at building the colony in the past, Cicropros is using his clones to see if the colony is safe or not.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 大酋長サイクロプロス

REGULAR.description:
They say the planet named Mii-kun`s Mansion of Life is a flower and animal-filled planet where the souls of beloved pets of children are brought to rest. Tetsuro, mistakenly believing Maetel is being attacked, draws his gun on the animals, only to be stopped by a mysterious woman.
Source: crunchyroll

The 999 is in really bad shape on the Planet of the Cowardly Elder! And it`s the doing of the cowardly president of the planet who trusts no one, Delmukade. His motive is Tetsuro`s body because he lacks the courage to adopt a mechanical body.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Empire of the Cowardly Elder

REGULAR.description:
The suitcase with Tetsuro and Maetel`s passes is stolen. However, the thief collapses while making their escape. It turns out the people on this planet have only one percent of a normal human`s physical strength. Even a gunshot from their guns barely stings. They easily get their suitcase back, but the passes are counterfeit!
Source: crunchyroll

Maetel is abducted by the Chief as soon as they arrive at the Spherical Housing Complex, a complex of spherical houses. There are no men here who will oppose the Chief who dwells in a castle in the sky. On the way to rescue her, Tetsuro encounters a man who looks exactly like an older version of himself, Tetsugoro Hoshino.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyuujou Juutaku Dan no Daishuuchou Zenpen
The Chief of the Spherical Housing Complex: Part One
球状住宅団の大酋長 前編

REGULAR.description:
Within the Chief`s castle Tetsuro learns of some sort of secret and sees Maetel being subservient to the Chief. He tries to save her but is almost sent flying out into space. Tetsugoro, livid after finding out that his former lover was killed, plants a bomb on the Chief`s castle. Tetsuro has to save Maetel in the five minutes before the bomb detonates!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyuujou Juutaku Dan no Daishuuchou Kouhen
The Chief of the Spherical Housing Complex: Part Two
球状住宅団の大酋長 後編

REGULAR.description:
As they approach the station, the Face of Memories, a woman passenger named Female causes a disturbance on the train and derails the 999. However, it seems that she knew the Conductor when he was young. As if to anger the Conductor on purpose, she slaps Maetel. An angry Conductor takes a gravity control device that derailed the train...
Source: crunchyroll

Tetsuro has his pass stolen on a planet where the wind never stops blowing. Tetsuro believes the thief to be a young man named Kira but Kira denies any wrongdoing. The next day, Kira shows up in front of Tetsuro, confused. He says he wanted to steal the pass so he could board the 999. But Kira`s father who should be crying, apologizing for his son, is actually...
Source: crunchyroll

At Deadwood Mountain, a young man named Prider arrived on a train in order to make money for his girlfriend Alice by music. Tetsuro feels bad for his girlfriend, but doesn`t say so. He gets angry at Prider, who never stops singing. While fighting, Tetsuro remembers how he got his pass from Maetel. Just then, the 999 is taken over by a horrible mother-and-daughter duo known as Valkyries.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Space Ride of the Valkyries: Part One
ワルキューレの空間騎行 前編

REGULAR.description:
Tetsuro, haven been taken aboard the Valkyrie`s mothership, tries to escape. Prider tries to defend Tetsuro and is stabbed by the Valkyries. The Valkyrie mother, whose anger stems from the fact her daughter was murdered by a human, squares off against the four of them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Space Ride of the Valkyries: Part Two
ワルキューレの空間騎行 後編

REGULAR.description:
Maetel, Nanmi, and Tetsuro go down to an ancient battlefield. Fully automated tanks which activate when they detect the presence of life have been left behind there. After Nanmi is shot, Maetel suddenly points a gun at Tetsuro. What did Maetel have to do in order to survive this crisis?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: エルアラメインの歌声

REGULAR.description:
On a planet where war is considered a tourist attraction, the 999 stops and the passengers eat dinner while watching people actually in battle. Tetsuro was eating when a soldier is killed and another soldier, Zeda, sees Tetsuro and goes after him, thinking Tetsuro enjoyed it. Tetsuro takes his gun from the 999 and goes to work with the man to clear the misunderstanding.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Laboratory of Eternal War: Part One
永久戦斗実験室 前編

REGULAR.description:
Zeda is convinced to join a rebel militia by a female soldier named Santana and they set off to not fight as a tourist attraction, but to do battle with the leader of the planet. They are betrayed by Brudas and the enemy is given their battle plan. Tetsuro gives this information to Zeda but the government is plotting an ambush...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Laboratory of Eternal War: Part Two
永久戦斗実験室 後編

REGULAR.description:
Tetsuro and the gang go to a planet full of industrious people. A planet that, although poor, is brimming with vigor. The husband and wife who run the inn where they are staying at are also hard workers. They are warmly welcomed. However, Tetsuro and Maetel lose their passes and luggage when a typhoon hits. Tetsuro suspects the husband and wife who run the inn, but...
Source: crunchyroll

A woman named Eroze who controls the tunnels that don`t absorb any sound tries to destroy the 999. In order to save the 999 from destruction, Tetsuro goes with the woman. We then find out she`s actually an android who was built for schadenfreude. Tetsuro becomes enraged that she`d pull off so many horrible pranks including destroying the 999. Then at long last...
Source: crunchyroll

An oddly shaped planet complete with giant life-forms appears in the 999`s path. Though they have the desire, the planet lacks the desire to move and the 999, unable to escape, sinks into the planet. In order to rescue the 999, the Galaxy Railways Administration decides to send out oscillation waves to destroy the planet. When that is supposed to happen, a transparent woman lands in a space ship.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Artemis of the Transparent Sea: Part One
透明海のアルテミス 前編

REGULAR.description:
The transparent woman is named Artemis. She lives on the oddly shaped planet but left to get a mechanical body and now she wishes to reside on the planet. But, to pay back her debts, she is forced to perform backbreaking labor. In the end, she returned to rest with her mother. Tetsuro cries at her death...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Artemis of the Transparent Sea: Part Two
透明海のアルテミス 後編

REGULAR.description:
Maetel, mistakenly brings Manabu Sunayama, a boy with a pass for the 999 who looks identical to Tetsuro, back to the hotel. Sunyama and his siblings worked themselves to the bone to get a pass to board the 999. Manabu`s older brother lost his life in the process. But, the pass turns out to be a fake, and...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tetsuro on the Planet of Mirrors

REGULAR.description:
Tetsuro and Maetel are captured by a group of bug-humans named Insectors who rule the planet. They go to boil them to use as food for their children. But, the boiling point of water on the planet is low due to the planet`s environment, so they escape unscathed. However, the Insectors proceed to cover the 999 in a cocoon. They plan to use the 999 and its passengers as food for their children as they send them off to another planet with food.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Owari Naki Natsu no Monogatari Zenpen
The Tale of the Endless Summer: Part One
終わりなき夏の物語 前編

REGULAR.description:
Tetsuro is unable to shoot the Insector babies that hatch from their eggs. The 999 then takes off into space with the Insector babies on board. The babies eat the seats, floors, and everything in sight with an amazing appetite. Just when you think the humans are in danger, though...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Owari Naki Natsu no Monogatari Kouhen
The Tale of the Endless Summer: Part Two
終わりなき夏の物語 後編

REGULAR.description:
On the Dinosaur Planet, a dinosaur named Tiny asks Tetsuro to let him board the 999. Of course, the 999 isn`t built for dinosaur-sized passengers, no matter how "tiny" he may be. However, the locals are fearful of people from other planets and attack and capture them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Cold Blooded Empire: Part One

REGULAR.description:
Tiny, learning of Tetsuro`s trouble from his girlfriend Rayde, asks her to give a message to him. Rayde rescues Tetsuro in Tiny`s place and forwards the message. Tiny`s message says "You`re awfully polite considering we`re friends." Tetsuro, unwilling to never see Tiny again, sets off to see him once again.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Cold Blooded Empire: Part Two

REGULAR.description:
On a planet rumored to have ghosts, Tetsuro encounters a ghost made of water. After being asked by that ghost, Yayoi, Tetsuro digs up the spot underneath a tree. Maetel, worried about Tetsuro, drives Yayoi the ghost away. But inside of the package is...
Source: crunchyroll

The Lazy Man`s Mirror is a planet where everything has been made to be automatic and men have nothing to do. They`ve gotten obese enough to literally make their houses explode. A woman named Sabrina realizes that she doesn`t want to be on this planet anymore and asks Tetsuro to help her board the 999. But, the Galaxy Railways` policies dictate that a pass is required to board...
Source: crunchyroll

They arrive on the Future Planet, a planet where the existence of the 999 is kept secret. There, Tetsuro`s pass is stolen by a young boy named Taro who dreams of traveling in space. Tetsuro and Maetel search for a place to stay and end up at a cheap hostel where they meet an aspiring comic-artist named Futoshi Adachi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Planet of a Pint Size Room: Part One
大四畳半惑星の幻想 前編

REGULAR.description:
Without even food to eat, Tetsuro begins to work. But, they won`t reissue his pass so unless he gets it back he will be unable to board the 999. So Tetsuro and Maetel decide to wait at the station to get their passes back. There, Taro shows up, but he`s suddenly not sure if he truly wants to board the 999...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Planet of a Pint Size Room: Part Two
大四畳半惑星の幻想 後編

REGULAR.description:
Under the "Perfect Sleep" law, you are not allowed to go out at night on the planet Town without Night. There, Tetsuro gets into a scuffle with a group of men hoping to get a shot of the kind monster Heron, and the police are called. He`s taken in by the police and it looks like he won`t make it back in time to board the 999. Then, Heron appears once again...
Source: crunchyroll

Tetsuro is asked by a woman to kill her sister Lelan who is trying to launch an artificial sun on planet Dark-Dark, a place enveloped in the dark of night. Her concern is that they don`t know what will happen if the artificial sun is launched and it is not dark anymore. But, Lelan kidnaps Maetel and sets her plan into motion!
Source: crunchyroll

On the planet, the Mecca of Silence, where making loud noises is against the law, Maetel tries to stop Tetsuro when he goes to yell out the window of the 999 but fails. Tetsuro is quickly put to death for no reason other than making the loud noise, but is rescued by a woman named Sylvia. It turns out her husband was killed as well. However, they begin to chase after Tetsuro again...
Source: crunchyroll

On the planet the Witch`s Harp, a land where almost all food is given as tribute to the queen and the people are in a food shortage, they meet a young man named Nichola who is killed over a tiny amount of food. Enraged, Tetsuro and Maetel set off to the queen`s island to stop this tributary system. However, there they have a surprising discovery...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Symphonic Poem and the Witch`s Harp
交響詩 魔女の堅琴

REGULAR.description:
The Foggy Funeral Planet is a planet where, as all its inhabitants have become cyborgs, everyone is immortal and they think not much of death. They`ve begun to practice performing funerals for whoever they feel like and they make a pastime of it. Maetel and Tetsuro are attacked and buried alive but are rescued by a woman named Machiru. She tells them why the planet has become the way it has, but then she is sacrificed for a funeral herself!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Planet of Funeral in the Mist

REGULAR.description:
Space Monk Dyruz travels the galaxy from planet to planet ringing his bell. The vibrations from his bell derail the 999 and cause Tetsuro`s teeth to fall to pieces. Because of this, they go for emergency treatment at the Emergency Medical Treatment Asteroid. There they encounter two people. One of them, a young man named Mikail, is badly injured and is ready to give up on life. Tetsuro and Dyruz compete to see who can give the young man hope again...
Source: crunchyroll

On planet Curiosity they capture humans out of curiosity and dissect their bodies. They force the 999 to land there then force Maetel to get naked. They then command the Conductor to dissect Maetel. But, when Tetsuro cuts into the planet with the knife instead...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kouki Shin to Iu Na no Hoshi

REGULAR.description:
The 999`s locomotive, C62, leaves the passenger cars behind and takes off. Though it`s a test to see how Tetsuro will pass the time, Tetsuro plays merrily with the Conductor and Maetel and kills the time. But, there are two robbers who stole a good amount of money on board, and...
Source: crunchyroll

The people on the Flower Capital, which is overflowing with flowers in bloom, all have a special armor. This is because the flowers there all emit a poisonous pollen. But someone has to burn all the flowers in order to save the people...
Source: crunchyroll

On Limbo, a planet without grass nor trees, Tetsuro and Maetel meet a man living tough life tilling the ground in such hard conditions, and his son, Yosaku. They plan to till the ground until the crops are ripe but a monstrous bird comes attacking. In order to protect him, Tetsuro and Yosaku fight the bird...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Pioneer from the River of Purgatory

REGULAR.description:
Planet Kilimanjaro is a snow-laden planet with three shining suns. There, Tetsuro and the gang are captured by a race of people who are as thin as paper, the Ghost Hoppers. They`re proud of their technology and plan to use them as specimens in a scientific experiment...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Africa the Great Dark Nebula: Part One
大暗黒惑星アフリカ 前編

REGULAR.description:
The gang successfully escapes from jail and encounter the Ghost Hoppers` sacred queen. She says their people pushed science too far and that is why they look the way they do. The Queen helps them revert the 999`s tracks back to the way they were. She decided to rebel against her own subjects who would not heed her advice.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Africa the Great Dark Nebula: Part Two
大暗黒惑星アフリカ 後編

REGULAR.description:
The 999 lands on a planet where every inhabitant is a beggar. But there is a married couple, Rage and Pity, who want it to stop. They board the 999 because they are sick of all the beggars and want to go to another planet where they can live on their own power alone. They steal the money and clothes from Tetsuro and Maetel, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 17 Oku 6 Sen 5 Hyaku man Nin no Kurekure Hoshi

REGULAR.description:
"Heed our requests or we`ll blow you up!" Those were the words that came from a planet that even Maetel didn`t know that forced the 999 to make an unscheduled landing. The people on the planet mostly live underwater. The one who issued the order to land was the president of an underwater race which had emigrated there, Waterpress. These people had polluted the water as much as they could and continued to fight against the planet`s natives, the Cheyenne Fish...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cheyenne the Nation of Water: Part One
Mizu no Kuni no Cheyenne Zenpen
水の国のシャイアン 前編

REGULAR.description:
The chief of the Cheyenne Fish, Navarro, gives chase to Water Press who had forced the 999 to take his people on board. He chases them in an old-fashioned space shuttle in order to continue to the fight. The Administration sends out an armored car to rescue the 999 after receiving a distress signal. But, with Tetsuro and Maetel as hostages, there is nothing they can do. Plus, they allow Navarro to enter the train after flying up in the old-fashioned shuttle.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cheyenne the Nation of Water: Part Two
Mizu no Kuni no Cheyenne Kouhen
水の国のシャイアン 後編

REGULAR.description:
The next stop is the Rainy Pond. They will be stopped there for 64 hours and 23 minutes. Tetsuro and Maetel check into their hotel on this planet where the rain never stops. But, a man who was also on the 999 makes a big fuss. He spends the night reciting sutras and bothering the other 999 passengers in the hotel. The man says he is praying because there is a witch on that planet who eats people`s souls and he doesn`t want anyone to be harmed. Maetel says she`s heard of this witch before...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Saintly Woman Who Devours Souls: Part One

REGULAR.description:
The woman says she is the most beautiful woman in the universe and she drinks people`s flames of life in order to maintain that beauty eternally. Her name is Cueflame and she is after Maetel`s flame of life. Working underneath her is the old lady from the hotel and a young woman named Arc. Following Cueflame`s orders, the two of them go to remove Maetel`s flame of life. If she drinks the flame of life from Maetel, she will die. So then, Tetsuro goes to recapture it...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Saintly Woman Who Devours Souls: Part Two

REGULAR.description:
Planet Heavy Meldar. Once they pass through here, they will leave the Earth Administration`s jurisdiction and enter Andromedan jurisdiction. Right before arrival, they encounter a man wearing a cloak. They didn`t get a good look at his face but he`s carrying a space soldier`s Cosmo Gun of which only four exist in the universe. Upon arrival, Maetel says she has to take care of some business and leaves. Feeling that was odd, Tetsuro goes to look for her and enters a drinking establishment...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Pirate of Time Castle: Part One
時間城の海賊 前編

REGULAR.description:
Leryuz lets Tetsuro know that Maetel went to the Castle of Time to battle with the pirate there. Tetsuro asks the people in the bar where the Castle of Time is, but everyone is fearful of Captain Harlock, who rules the Castle of Time, and refuses to help Tetsuro. But, the man in the cloak from the train saves Tetsuro from their violence. Encouraged by the words of the hooded man, one man lets Tetsuro borrow his auto-bike to go to the Castle of Time. He leaves all alone to go rescue Maetel from the duel with Harlock!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Pirate of Time Castle: Part Two
時間城の海賊 中編

REGULAR.description:
Tetsuro is sent into the past. There, against all of Tetsuro`s efforts, his mother his killed just as before. Tetsuro realizes that he cannot alter the past. But then through Leryuz`s ability to manipulate time, he is brought back to the present. While this is going on, we find out what kind of a horrible man the fake Harlock is in his duel with Maetel. He used to fight to restore peace to the galaxy, just like Maetel. But, he betrayed his people, including Maetel, and disrupted their attempt at a revolution.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Pirate of Time Castle: Part Three
時間城の海賊 後編

REGULAR.description:
The next station is a plant called "The Butterfly`s Dream." There coexists graceful people with butterfly wings and a discriminated lower class without them. The people with wings live short lives that run out when the season of the cold winds comes. Because of this, they try to live their days having as much fun as possible. But, one girl, Kureha, wants to see more of the world during her short life, so she goes into the forbidden woods. There she meets a poor, wingless boy named Leaf.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Tale of a Short Life
短かな生命[いのち]の物語

REGULAR.description:
Planet number one, Zaba, and plane number four, Maya, are engaged in a war to the death. Though they knew nearby planet number five was about to blow up, the 999 had to make a critical stop on planet number three. Upon exiting the train, Maetel and Tetsuro are attacked by a mysterious ape-man and their passes are stolen. While researching the planet, they meet a boy from planet number one, Seth. He came with his girlfriend from Zaba, which was on the verge of destruction. They plan to stop the mysterious degeneration on planet number three to create a new Zaba.
Source: crunchyroll

Tetsuro spots a message in a bottle from the 999`s window. In it is a letter written by the adventurer Stanley, who is exploring the planet Arcadia. From the looks of the letter, Stanley and his crew are in grave danger in their search for the giant elephant, Flame. Tetsuro persuades the 999 to go the planet. Quickly following the clues, they come across Stanley, his wife Merusa, and their assistant, Narl. Though Merusa and Narl are happy to be rescued, Stanley stubbornly wishes to continue his exploration.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Planet of the Giant Elephant

REGULAR.description:
They stop for thirty-eight hours and fourteen minutes on the Planet of Illusive Love. There, Tetsuro loses sight of Maetel and encounters a girl selling her poems, Naya. Naya is curious about the aspiring artist who lives in a room that she goes to visit, Lestel. Lestel, though, is in love with a women who poses as his model, Feras. But, Feras appears to be in love with a rich young man from the cafe she works at, Bina.
Source: crunchyroll

The next stop is the Wisdom Tooth Planet. There many of the children have ran away from homes so there are many impatient adults who have grown weary from waiting for them to return. The son of the owners of the inn Tetsuro and Maetel stay at also ran away from home. The father, suffering from a case of stress-induced dementia, is convinced that Tetsuro his is long lost son, Tetsuo. But then the real Tetsuo, a fugitive murderer, returns home...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The UFO of the Planet of Forgotten Parents

REGULAR.description:
On the planet built by God, people are constantly performing military drills. They are also very military in nature and perform their security checks very seriously. The Suraroids, who escaped the construction of the underwater city, are in a fierce fight with the Brittenians. The Brittenian Nazuka was looking forward to the return of his lover, the Suraroidan queen, Elza, but...
Source: crunchyroll

On the Planet where Fate Divides, there are refugees from a planet which was about to be destroyed, are living a very primitive lifestyle. They hunt animals by hand and wear pelts. It`s just like the Stone Age. One of these "people of the future" is a young man named Yaku who is skilled at creating tools. Because he is not physically gifted, Yaku goes to hunt game with a bow and arrow. Tetsuro sees him and he declares that, more so than his planet being destroyed, he has to focus on how he`ll live from here on out. Then he makes a big change in the way he hunts...
Source: crunchyroll

The Hangman`s Planet. On this desolate planet that looks like something straight out of a western, Tetsuro quickly gets himself into trouble. Two gangs, the Blacks and Whites, are in a bitter dispute over the gold being mined here. In order not to raise suspicions as to who is guilty, the White gang conscripts a lone gunman named Wester and the Black gang conscripts Tetsuro. This quickly escalates into a draw between the two, and they haven`t even realized it`s a plot by the Sheriff and Mayor yet...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ガンマン哀歌[えれじい]

REGULAR.description:
The gateway planet to Andromeda, Snowinca. Maetel tells Tetsuro a legend from this planet where if you so much as glance at the Snow Woman she will kill you. Maetel takes Tetsuro to the universe`s best ramen shop, after arriving on the planet. At night, Tetsuro goes back to the ramen shop alone. While chatting with the owner, the fabled Snow Woman enters the shop!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Snow Woman of Andromeda: Part One
アンドロメダの雪女 前編

REGULAR.description:
While searching for Tetsuro, Maetel encounters a mechanical body salesman named Snowlock. At the same time, we learn that the "Death upon glancing" rumor was made up by the aforementioned salesman. It was to keep the Snow Woman from giving away free mechanical bodies. However, she plans to turn Tetsuro into a cyborg, then take his body to go eat hot ramen. Then Tetsuro decides he`ll agree to make ramen that even she can eat that will warm her all the way to her heart.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Snow Woman of Andromeda: Part Two
アンドロメダの雪女 後編

REGULAR.description:
Here, on the Planet of the Rainbow Sash, the paranoid governor has forced the people to live in an underwater city due to a nuclear war he started. But, that city is about to be destroyed, too! After a chance meeting in a hotel run by an arrogant manager with a young employee, Tetsuro is allowed to stay in his apartment. He also receives a pass for the emigration capsule. He goes to escape with his coworker, Kumiko, but he is double-crossed...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Final Days of the Underwater City

REGULAR.description:
There are warnings about mysterious murders taking place on the Bug Planet. After arrival, Tetsuro and Maetel come across the murder scene of a business man. It seems that the key to the murders is a girl named Keiko who supports the bugs` cause and has sided with them. She then quickly asks Tetsuro if he`d become a bug-man to help save the planet`s insects. Then, some very tiny bug-men appear in front of Tetsuro.
Source: crunchyroll

The Locomotive detects something abnormal. It appears that someone or something is blocking the space rails. Upon realizing that this is sabotage, the Locomotive informs the Conductor that this is the notorious "Yayaball`s Tiny World". This is a miniature Earth that has been entirely shaped to fit the whims of its creator, Yayaball. After checking in at the hotel with Maetel, Tetsuro is invited out to dinner by Yayaball.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ヤーヤボールの小さな世界 前編

REGULAR.description:
After hearing Tetsuro`s reasons for his journey, Yayaball feels that Tetsuro may indeed be strong. He is also plotting to kill those superior to him. Maetel assumes his mother is alive and didn`t die in the accident years ago so she asks Tetsuro to search the mansion. It seems the one pulling Yayaball`s strings from the shadows harbors a secret...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ヤーヤボールの小さな世界 後編

REGULAR.description:
Quima is a place where everything is forced to become mechanized. The Conductor tells Maetel and Tetsuro to only eat at the Galaxy Railways` sanctioned establishment. They then proceed to check into the hotel. On this planet, mechanized cats named Catroids and a group of flying cats named the Flying Kuros are aggravating the police. Caught in the mix, Tetsuro and Maetel are arrested as traitors while trying to pursue the cats.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: フライング・クロ 前編

REGULAR.description:
Tetsuro and Maetel met a girl named Neko while chasing Catroids. She is hiding Meow, the leader of the Catroids, from the police. She then tells Tetsuro, in tears, about the atrocities being committed by the police on the planet. The police wanted to force everyone to become cyborgs. They set up a trap in a sushi restaurant, captured people there, and converted each one to having a mechanical body. Both Neko and Meow fell victim to this plot so they are using the skills of the Flying Kuros to sniff out humans.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: フライング・クロ 後編

REGULAR.description:
The next stop is the Planet of the Forgotten Ones. This is a planet that was destined for destruction. There is a planet left that has been worn down by the relentlessly burning sun. The people here have to submit an application to a government official to see if they qualify to escape the planet. But, one author, Mori, decides to stay behind and finish writing the history of the planet. Tetsuro meets with him and tries fervently to convince him to escape, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The One Book Left in the Universe
Uchuu ni Nokotta Issatsu no Hon
宇宙に残った一冊の本

REGULAR.description:
In the Bottomless City, buildings rise as high and go down as deep as is humanly possible. Tetsuro and Maetel check into their hotel there. But, it seems it to be best to not use the elevator. But, Tetsuro becomes worried when someone named Kezaluna calls out to Maetel, so he uses the elevator to search for her. But, it turns out to be a four-dimensional elevator that transports him into different dimensions. In there, of all things, Tetsuro sees Maetel and Kezaluna`s wedding ceremony!
Source: crunchyroll

The Conductor lazily says, "Ehh, the next stop is Loose Zone. We`ll be stopped for twelve hours or so. Yes we`re arriving at Loose Zone." Feeling just as lazy and loose as him, Tetsuro ends up being ejected from the 999. Maetel and the Conductor search to find him, while he clings on to dear life. Unfortunately, the search is fruitless and he is flung off the train. He ends up in a space tunnel filled with garbage. Running away from the giant garbage monster there, Tetsuro ends up on the path to get to planet Loose Zone.
Source: crunchyroll

They land on the Planet of Dream Pursuit. This is a planet of overrun logic where those who do not work hard are put to death immediately. For the reason, people`s jobs are assigned by the government. A young rocket mission control officer named Aaron loves comics so much that he`s often scribbling pictures on the forms at his work place. He wanted to be a comic book author but the government assigned him to a role as a rocket mission control officer. However, he couldn`t throw his dream away...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Planet of Eternal Dream Pursuit

REGULAR.description:
On the planet of the Queen`s Rebellion, the Hornets, Wasps, and Honeybees all coexist. However, because of the Queen`s polarizing personality, the honeybees and the wasps are fighting. A young wasp named Damu is frightened as the sudden fighting breaks out throughout the town and the air. Filming the rebellion with a hand-made camera, he tells of the impending war to Maetel and Tetsuro.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Planet of the Queen`s Rebellion

REGULAR.description:
The 999 is attacked suddenly on Planet Ali Baba and crash lands deep in the desert. Tetsuro and Maetel go to head to town while the Conductor heads to the station to contact the Galaxy Railways Authority. They are forced to cross the desert. Ali Baba is a land known for being filled with thieves. Not surprisingly, Tetsuro and Maetel are captured by a group of bandits before making it to town. Forced to strip to their underwear, except for the Conductor who is conspicuously missing, they are taken to Ali Baba, the leader of the bandits...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: アンドロメダ千夜一夜 前編

REGULAR.description:
Tetsuro is attacked by a mysterious bird assassin, Roc, while Maetel is attacked by a mysterious woman. And it looks like a fight as begun between this woman and the bandits who captured Maetel. It turns out that this woman is the true Ali Baba. She lost her position as the top bandit in Ali Baba to the woman they met before, the fake Ali Baba. After Tetsuro and Maetel are rescued by the true Ali Baba, she joins with him to defeat the fake one.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: アンドロメダ千夜一夜 後編

REGULAR.description:
On planet Legend, Tetsuro notices lots of people straggling by the wayside. Maetel points out that they are cyborgs who have lost the desire to live. Two young people, Meim and Saki wake up Tetsuro in his hotel room. When Tetsuro refuses to fight against the leader of the cyborgs, he is going to be put to death. When Tetsuro is spared by the leader of the cyborgs, we learn that he is trying to make this a planet only for cyborgs.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Legend of the Young Warriors

REGULAR.description:
"I want to board the 999, too," says brothers, without form, who float off in the distance. Feeling pity for his brother Crosalis`s words, Aron stops the 999 in hopes of mechanizing themselves into Ghost Station No. 13. The 999 is forced to make an emergency stop on Station No.13. Though the Conductor agrees to stop there, when asked by the Locomotive, neither him nor Maetel have heard of this planet. Sensing something is amiss, the Locomotive orders them to withdraw.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 幽霊駅[ゴーストステーション]13号

REGULAR.description:
The planet, the Knights of Kilimanjaro. Chivalry lives on here and two countries are fighting a proper, open war. There, Tetsuro witnesses a biplane dogfight. He spots one pilot who is slacking off during the dogfight. The name of this pilot is Izaka. He`s not of high lineage like the other pilots and wants nothing more than to fly the skies like a bird. But, his dear friend Kikuo is killed from another plane`s attack. Izaka explodes in rage while he watches everyone celebrating the ceasefire, ignoring the fact that his friend was sacrifices.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: キリマンジャロの鳥人

REGULAR.description:
Main and Sab are passing the time by acting out a war. They are the last two people living on this planet where everything is controlled by Mother Computer Junior But, bored with war, the two plot to use the 999 to escape the planet. Since they need two people to use as scapegoats to trick Mother Computer Junior, they choose Maetel and Tetsuro!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Destruction of Macaroni au Gratin
マカロニグラタンの崩壊

REGULAR.description:
The 999 enters into a warp at high speed to make up for a large amount of lost time. But, the flow of time inside the warp is messed up and they encounter a 999 from a different time! They suffer a minor accident. On the 999 from the past, or maybe the future, is Maetel, the Conductor, and a young boy who looks similar to Tetsuro, named Redril. Redril has the same warrior`s gun as Tetsuro. Then they head towards a drifting planet where a new danger awaits!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: メーテルの旅 前編

REGULAR.description:
The 999 has encountered a 999 from another time inside of the warp. The two Maetels ended up landing on the wandering planet, Phantom, which is populated with strange life-forms. They are let go once they realize they are humans. But, the Conductor is captured by a different create altogether! They want to use the 999 to escape. It turns out that, on this wandering planet, the cyborgs are persecuted by the humans!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: メーテルの旅 後編

REGULAR.description:
The Bat Planet is the last stop before the final station, planet Promethium. Because of this, this is where many passengers come and ponder as to whether they should become cyborgs or not. Tetsuro is one of these people. There, they meet an aspiring animator named Masai. He works by drawing portraits of travelers to save money to get a mechanical body in order to overcome his weak physical body and pursue his dream of making cartoons. But then, he steals Tetsuro`s pass...
Source: crunchyroll

Tetsuro finally arrives at the final destination, Promethium. However, he still cannot choose whether or not to become a cyborg. He is given twenty-four hours to make up his mind. But, during that time, Tetsuro speaks to a cyborg who was sick of eternal life and attempts to commit suicide. This man tells Tetsuro of Maetel`s true identity as Promethium`s daughter. Then, his guide, Mirai, tells Tetsuro that he has been chosen to be a vanguard soldier of the Mechanized Empire. Tetsuro confronts Maetel...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Vision of Youth, Farewell, 999: Part One
青春の幻影 さらば999 前編

REGULAR.description:
Upon choosing not to get a mechanical body, the Queen tries to send Tetsuro and the 999 into the black hole. And Maetel and her father, Ban, are both imprisoned for being traitors. But she breaks out and rescues the 999 from peril. Maetel is reunited with Tetsuro. They will use the energy from the pendant that Maetel`s father was sealed in to defeat Promethium!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Vision of Youth, Farewell, 999: Part Two
青春の幻影 さらば999 後編
